title: Audit User Permissions
description: As part of a security audit, an agent needs to identify all users with 'Super Admin' privileges.

tasks.description: Run a query to get a list of all users and their assigned roles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a complete list of users.

tasks.description: Filter the list to show only users with the 'Super Admin' role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a list of all super administrators.

tasks.description: Provide the list to the security team for their review and validation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent delivers the required data for the audit.
